title: Dentsu Group and University of Tokyo Launch INOU CREATIVE School Program to Nurture Uniquely Talented Creatives - Dentsu Group Inc.
text:
Dentsu Group and University of Tokyo Launch INOU CREATIVE School Program to Nurture Uniquely Talented Creatives
Jul 15, 2025
- Sustainability
- Business & Services
― Co-creating ideas and bringing them to life. Theme for first term is “Making Tokyo Bay the World’s Most Vibrant Sea” ―
Dentsu Group Inc. (Brand: dentsu; Headquarters: Dentsu Group Inc.; Location: Minato-ku, Tokyo; President & Global CEO: Hiroshi Igarashi) announced that on July 11, 2025, Dentsu Inc. (President & CEO: Takeshi Sano; Head Office: Tokyo; hereafter: Dentsu), the core company for the Group’s Japanese businesses, together with the University of Tokyo (hereafter: UTokyo; Campus: Bunkyo-ku, Tokyo; President: Teruo Fujii), held an opening ceremony in the Yasuda Auditorium of UTokyo for INOU CREATIVE School*1. This new program is aimed at developing “unique talented creatives” through the co-creation of new ideas that can serve as model cases for solving social issues and their implementation in society. For further details see Dentsu’s press release*2.
The Group seeks to enhance its corporate value by further integrating financial and non-financial aspects of its business and by generating ideas for the future to solve challenges facing society through business*3.
*1: INOU CREATIVE School official website (Japanese): https://inou-creative.com/
*2: “Dentsu inc. and University of Tokyo Launch INOU CREATIVE School Program to Nurture Uniquely Talented Creatives”
URL: https://www.dentsu.co.jp/en/news/release/2025/0715-010922.html
*3: For details, please refer to the Sustainability page on Dentsu Group Inc.’s website:
URL: https://www.group.dentsu.com/en/sustainability/
#####

Jumpei Kojima, Toru Nakagawa
